about_the_game:
Chaos Crown is a fantasy roguelite with role playing elements. Get loot to upgrade your champions and battle even stronger foes. Can you master them all?

At its current state, the demo includes those features :
  • You can choose a champion.
  • You can preview upcoming champions.
  • You can upgrade a champion using the skills stree or the character menu.
  • Two champions with a unique combat-style are playable.
  • One forest map visual.
  • You can walk through a procedural path that includes rooms with different objectives such as defeat all enemies or open a treasure chest.
  • You can loot temporarly items.
  • You can encounter Chaos Lords and get exclusive rewards from them.
